mapper.select: select count(1) from study inner join patient on study.patient_fk = patient.pk

select study.pk as id, study.study_datetime, study.study_iuid, study.study_id, study.num_instances, study.accession_no, study.ref_physician, study.mods_in_study,
patient.pat_name, patient.pat_id, patient.pat_id_issuer, patient.pat_birthdate, patient.pat_sex from study inner join patient on study.patient_fk = patient.pk
order by study_datetime desc LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET (#{pageSize} * (#{pageNumber} - 1))
